description.long_description: Utility for finding suitable helicopter landing zones surrounding a speciflzied target location.

exclude_regions.description: List of raster image(s) representing mask files that defines regions to be excluded from HLZ solutions

include_regions.description: List of raster image(s) representing mask files that defines regions that must be included in HLZ solutions

max_roughness.description: Threshold for acceptable landing zone terrain roughness (meters).

max_slope.description: Threshold for acceptable landing zone terrain slope (deg).

point_clouds.description: Specifies list of ancillary point-cloud data for level-2 search for obstructions.

hlz_coding.description: Specifies the pixel values (0-255) for the pixels representing unsuitable terrain.

marginal_zone_index.description: Specifies the pixel values (0-255) for the pixels representing marginal terrain.

good_zone_index.description: Specifies the pixel values (0-255) for the pixels representing good terrain.

outputFile.description: The URL/filename of the WMS server where the file is now accessible
